# SOMGraphAnal

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of SOMGraphAnal is to serve as a analysis tool for SOM learning quality 
measurements study. It represents CONN matrix into graph object and conducts both
graph property measurements and graph matching methods. The visualization of CONN 

## Installation

You can install the development version of SOMGraphAnal like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("Kay-zttang/SOMGraphAnal")
```
